name: G-Mode Archives+: Story of Seasons Mobile - Life & Love
storyline: Bokujou Monogatari: Life & Love follows a similar storyline to most of the games in the series. You live in a small farming village, and your goal is to grow your farm while finding a husband or wife to start a family with.
summary: Story of Seasons Mobile - Life & Love has all the core features from the series: farming, ranching, mining, gardening, getting married, and exploring your local village. It was originally available on Docomo phones in Japan before being ported to Steam in September of 2024.
